title: Drawing, probably 1864
medium: Charcoal, white chalk on blue-green wove paper
markings: Stamped in ink, at lower right: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description:
Recto: vertical view of the back of a drummer, shown facing left, and holding a drum.
Verso: vertical view of a soldier with an extended sword; and in horizontal direction from bottom to top are three soldiers who appear to be fighting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, probably 1864.
probably 1864. Charcoal, white chalk on blue-green wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-108.
